oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Programs; Pamphlets; Exhibitions; Centennial celebrations
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cover of a descriptive booklet of the buildings and exhibits of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition. The Parthenon and two cherubs adorn the front cover. The full text of the front cover reads "Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition opens at Nashville May 1st 1897 and continues six months. The Parthenon Art building of Exposition--A fireproof structure."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition Collection, 1895-1900
